Important notes:

1. The version of "@solana/web3.js" required is "1.31.0". Signatures produced are different for higher versions.
2. Validity of transaction (regardless of signature) is constrained by recentBlockhash. So a valid signature may still produce a failure on-chain.

Testing:

```
yarn sign  3Tab1f9H2SdJ1LeA7jj8Qo3LSr5xq6uQKwSALex65htACC5npyqg3s2uTsbMm5TfrmCmLfhBB7wMCMgsmQKtcqz7
```

should produce result

```
e8c4bc6161373b57ecf7bee17577b982eb1c76e8b1e63256b6fd285e404fbeb90d22a7bee2fb759183ff6799ed581afec24b15d43dec77a46c46902eae122d0d
```
